name: User Dashboard – Easy Digital Downloads
author: Amin Nazemi

sections.description:
Easily create a user dashboard for your easy digital downloads store just by adding [edd-dash] shortcode to a page.
Also, this plugin have a Gutenberg block to add the shortcode to a page or post to create a customer dashboard.

Tabs included:

  • Profile Edit
  • Download History
  • Purchase History
  • Access Pass details
  • Subscriptions
  • Licenses

Some of the tabs are just visible when a certain plugin is active.
sections.installation: You can install User Dashboard-Easy Digital Downloads by either using wordpress.org plugin directory, or by directly uploading plugin files to your server.
sections.faq:
How can I use this plugin?

It’s really easy just add this shortcode [edd-dash] to a page of your website and make sure the easy digital downloads plugin is active.

Where can I ask my questions regarding this plugin?

  • You can ask your questions here in English at live chat.

  • initial release

1.0.2

  • Change some main classes
  • Add wp 5.9 support
